course_description: The Humphrey Seminar is a major component of the Humphrey program on campus and serves as an introduction to many aspects of the U.S. culture and professional environment. The Seminar will include topics related to the program's goals and the Fellows' professional fields, allowing Fellows the opportunity to present and share information regarding their plans, work in their home country, and their professional activities.
sections: Class Nbr: 3188, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 9-11:50a, Instructor: K. Castro, Status: Open
